name: author_bot
column4: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
column4: Domain associated to the author in sortinghat profile.

name: author_id
column4: Author Id from sortinghat.

name: author_name
column4: Author name.

name: author_org_name
column4: Organization the author belongs to.

name: author_user_name
column4: Author user name.

name: author_uuid
column4: Author unique identifier from sortinghat.

name: branch
column4: Development branch created for this changeset.

name: closed
column4: Closing date of the changeset.

name: domain
column4: Domain of the developer sending the changeset.

name: githash
column4: Hash of the commit included in the changeset.

name: grimoire_creation_date
column4: Commit creation date.

name: is_gerrit_review
column4: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: metadata__enriched_on
column4: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
column4: Grimoire-ELK backend name.

name: metadata__gelk_version
column4: Grimoire-ELK version.

name: metadata__timestamp
column4: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
column4: Date when the item was updated in its originaldata source.

name: name
column4: Changeset submitter name.

name: number
column4: Gerrit changeset unique identifier.

name: ocean-unique-id
column4: Unique identifier for all of the datasets in the information lake.

name: opened
column4: Changeset sent date.

name: origin
column4: Original URL where the changeset was retrieved.

name: owner_bot
column4: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: owner_domain
column4: Domain associated to the author in sortinghat profile.

name: owner_id
column4: Author Id from sortinghat.

name: owner_name
column4: Author name.

name: owner_org_name
column4: Organization the author belongs to.

name: owner_user_name
column4: Author user name in the Gerrit system.

name: owner_uuid
column4: Author unique identifier from sortinghat.

name: patchsets
column4: Number of patchsets/iterations involved in the changeset.

name: project_1
column4: Second level project hierarchy (typically not used in Gerrit).

name: project
column4: First level project hierarchy.

name: repository
column4: Repository (project in Gerrit terminology) where the changeset is sent.

name: status
column4: Gerrit status such as Abandoned, Merged or Open. The actual value depends on the instance of Gerrit.

name: summary_analyzed
column4: Text summary added by the developer. This is typically the commit message. This field is tokenized for searching purposes.

name: summary
column4: Text summary added by the developer. This is typically the commit message.

name: tag
column4: Perceval tag.

name: timeopen
column4: Time that the changeset has been opened in days.

name: url
column4: Full URL pointing to the changesetFull URL pointing to the changeset.

name: uuid
column4: Perceval UUID
